subject: United States Figure Skating Championships
lead_paragraph: The Olympic silver medalists Meryl Davis and Charlie White took a step toward their third straight title at the United States Figure Skating Championships by winning the short dance at Greensboro, N.C.
snippet: The Olympic silver medalists Meryl Davis and Charlie White took a step toward their third straight title at the United States Figure Skating Championships by winning the short dance at Greensboro, N.C.
